subject: Steroids
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jose Canseco’s first literary work regarding steroids in baseball was enlightening and on the money. But as he prepares to drop more big names, let’s not forget that he has an agenda.
snippet: Jose Canseco’s first literary work regarding steroids in baseball was enlightening and on the money. But as he prepares to drop more big names, let’s not forget that he has an agenda.
